body_html:
THRTS is short for "TorcH RunTime System". At the moment, it's sole purpose in life is to contain the memory allocators. The precipitating reason why we want to factor it out is so that Caffe2 can use it (they are looking to stop doing static allocation and just do dynamic allocation, but they need a CUDA memory allocator, and THCAllocator is pretty good.)

Actually, in this PR, we don't have the CUDA memory allocator, but I will add it very shortly, in another package THCRTS.
